telephony_delete_group_warning: Deleting a telephony group will result in the related lines and numbers being deleted.
telephony_delete_group_infos: The group deletion request is scheduled for your next billing date. The request may be cancelled before that date.
telephony_delete_group_cancel_success: The {{group}} group has been successfully deleted.
telephony_delete_group_delete_success: The deletion of the {{group}} group has been scheduled.
